de.sub.goobi.metadaten

Class Paginator

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.sub.goobi.metadaten.Paginator

  • public class Paginator
extends Object
    Sets new labels to a given set of pages.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
         throws IllegalArgumentException
        Perform pagination.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if invalid config parameters have been set.

      • getPagesToPaginate

        public Metadatum[] getPagesToPaginate()
        Get pages provided with new pagination label.
        Returns:
        Array of Metadatum instances.

      • setPageSelection

        public Paginator setPageSelection(int[] selectedPages)
        Give a list of page numbers to select pages to actually paginate.
        Parameters:
        selectedPages - Array numbers, each pointing to a given page set via setPagesToPaginate
        Returns:
        This object for fluent interfacing.

      • setPagesToPaginate

        public Paginator setPagesToPaginate(Metadatum[] newPaginated)
        Give page objects to apply new page labels on.
        Parameters:
        newPaginated - Array of page objects.
        Returns:
        This object for fluent interfacing.

      • setPaginationMode

        public Paginator setPaginationMode(Paginator.Mode paginationMode)
        Set pagination mode.
        Parameters:
        paginationMode - Mode of counting pages.
        Returns:
        This object for fluent interfacing.

      • setPaginationScope

        public Paginator setPaginationScope(Paginator.Scope paginationScope)
        Set scope of pagination.
        Parameters:
        paginationScope - Set which pages from a selection get labeled.
        Returns:
        This object for fluent interfacing.

      • setPaginationSeparator

        public Paginator setPaginationSeparator(String sep)
        Set separator of pagination.
        Parameters:
        sep - Set the separator to separate pages.
        Returns:
        This object for fluent interfacing.

      • setPaginationStartValue

        public Paginator setPaginationStartValue(String paginationStartValue)
        Set start value of pagination. Counting up starts here depending on the pagination mode set.
        Parameters:
        paginationStartValue - May contain arabic or roman number.
        Returns:
        This object for fluent interfacing.

      • setPaginationType

        public Paginator setPaginationType(Paginator.Type paginationType)
        Determine whether arabic or roman numbers should be used when counting.
        Parameters:
        paginationType - Set style of pagination numbers.
        Returns:
        This object for fluent interfacing.

      • setFictitious

        public Paginator setFictitious(boolean b)
        Enable or disable fictitious pagination using square bracktes around numbers.
        Parameters:
        b - True, fictitious pagination. False, regular pagination.
        Returns:
        This object for fluent interfacing.
